meanings.definition: To edit or make changes to a document or text after it has been written or created.
meanings.sent1: After finishing his essay, he decided to postedit it for any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She always postedits her blog posts before publishing them.
meanings.sent3: The teacher postedited the students' papers with a red pen, making corrections.
meanings.sent4: She carefully postedited her resume to ensure it was perfect for the job application.
meanings.sent5: He postedited the email to clarify his message before sending it.

meanings.definition: The act of making edits or changes to a document or text after it has been written or created.
meanings.sent1: The postedit of the article was necessary to correct errors.
meanings.sent2: She performed a quick postedit of the report before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The postedit of the novel turned it into a bestseller.
meanings.sent4: The postedit of the presentation added valuable information.
meanings.sent5: The postedit of the document improved its clarity and readability.
